title: Touro Synagogue National Historic Site: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       The Touro Synagogue is located within an urban environment with a large number of tourists.Please be aware of your surroundings at all times. Police, fire, and rescue services are provided by the City of Newport. If at any time of your visit an emergency occurs, please report the incident to Synagogue staff, or call 911 for immediate assistance.
